含义: The character '及' primarily means 'and', 'as well as', or 'reach'. It is used to connect words or phrases, indicating addition or inclusion. It can also denote reaching a certain point or level.
字形: '及' is composed of two parts: the left part is a variant of '手' (hand), and the right part is '及' itself, which resembles a person reaching out. The character symbolizes the action of reaching or extending.
读音: The pronunciation of '及' is 'jí' in Mandarin Chinese.
字源: The character '及' originates from ancient Chinese pictographs. It depicts a hand reaching out to catch or touch something, symbolizing the concept of reaching or extending.
成语: 迫不及待 (cannot wait to do something)
望尘莫及 (far behind, unable to catch up)
过犹不及 (going too far is as bad as not going far enough)
例句: 他及时赶到了车站。 (He arrived at the station in time.)
这个问题涉及很多方面。 (This issue involves many aspects.)
他的成绩已经及格了。 (He has already passed the exam.)
短故事: 在古代，有一个书生为了考取功名，日夜苦读。终于，他在科举考试中及第，成为了一名官员。这个故事告诉我们，只要努力，就能达到目标。
有一次，小明在考试前没有好好复习，结果考试时措手不及，成绩很不理想。这让他明白了及时准备的重要性。
诗词:
《登鹳雀楼》 - 王之涣
白日依山尽，黄河入海流。
欲穷千里目，更上一层楼。
(诗中'及'虽未直接出现，但'更上一层楼'表达了'及'的延伸意义。)

《静夜思》 - 李白
床前明月光，疑是地上霜。
举头望明月，低头思故乡。
(诗中'及'虽未直接出现，但'举头'和'低头'的动作体现了'及'的延伸意义。)
